Package com.midiwars.logic.midi

Class MidiTimeline

  • Object
    • MidiTimeline

  • public class MidiTimeline
extends Object
    Timeline of a given midi file. Holds information about all the notes played, their start time and duration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MidiTimeline​(String filepath)
      Creates a new MidiTimeline object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNoteEvent​(int type, int key, long tick)
      Adds note event to timeline.
      void addTempo​(long tick, double tempo)
      Adds an entry to the tempo map.
      void constructTimeline​(String filepath)
      Reads the contents of the given midi file and constructs its timeline.
      ArrayList<Map.Entry<Long,Double>> getTempos​(long ticki, long tickf)
      Returns an ordered list of tick-tempos between the given time frame.
      ArrayList<NoteEvent> getTimeline​()
      Returns timeline.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MidiTimeline

        public MidiTimeline​(String filepath)
             throws InvalidMidiDataException,
                    IOException
        Creates a new MidiTimeline object.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to midi file.
        Throws:
        InvalidMidiDataException - Midi file is invalid.
        IOException - Can't open file.

    • Method Detail

      • constructTimeline

        public void constructTimeline​(String filepath)
                       throws InvalidMidiDataException,
                              IOException
        Reads the contents of the given midi file and constructs its timeline.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to midi file.
        Throws:
        InvalidMidiDataException - midi file is invalid.
        IOException - Can't open file.

      • addTempo

        public void addTempo​(long tick,
                     double tempo)
        Adds an entry to the tempo map.
        Parameters:
        tick - Instant in time (ticks) this tempo change happened.
        tempo - New tempo.

      • addNoteEvent

        public void addNoteEvent​(int type,
                         int key,
                         long tick)
        Adds note event to timeline.
        Parameters:
        type - NOTE_ON (0x90) or NOTE_OFF (0x80).
        key - Key number [0-127].
        tick - MidiEvent time-stamp (ticks).

      • getTempos

        public ArrayList<Map.Entry<Long,Double>> getTempos​(long ticki,
                                                   long tickf)
        Returns an ordered list of tick-tempos between the given time frame.
        Parameters:
        ticki - Lower limit of time frame to look at.
        tickf - Upper limit of time frame to look at.
        Returns:
        List of tempos.

      • getTimeline

        public ArrayList<NoteEvent> getTimeline​()
        Returns timeline.
        Returns:
        Timeline.
